name: Vee Is Calling
description:
Vee is Calling...

You find a cute girl online named Vee and set up a video call date to get to know each other. Have fun on your date!

Art and script by Mimi Chiu (mimimicee). Coding, music, and editing by Hamza Khan (fusionist). Korean translation by KyleHeren. Made in Ren'py.
